body:
Hi Rob,


> Sounds good, and hello to you Francesco, I'm glad to hear you are OK in 
> light of last week's event (Greg told me you and yours were OK).


I'm glad too!
We've been lucky this time.


This world is such a mess ...


Take care,


Francesco
